title: Feature: Auto-reset checklist when switching
description: Switching between checklists should automatically reset state. Currently state persists via localStorage which is undesired behavior.

title: Design: Add more fun animations to the UI
description: Enhance the visual experience with polished animations for list transitions and state changes.

title: Fix: Clicking items breaks spacebar navigation and skipping logic
description: When an item is clicked, the app enters a mode where the spacebar no longer works for completion. Also, clicking an item incorrectly skips items that have children.

title: Bug: Items with null children persistently crossed out
description: Items like 'how was today?' with all null children appear completed and can't be uncrossed. The isItemCompleted() function returns true when all children are null, even if the parent isn't in completedItems.

title: Design: Animations and sounds for all keyboard shortcuts
description: Provide immediate sensory feedback by adding specific animations and sound effects for every keyboard-triggered action.

title: Bug: Items with null children skipped in navigation
description: Items like 'how was today...' in night.json have children that are all null (headers). isActionable() returns false for items with children unless _checkable is set. Items with ONLY non-actionable children should still be actionable.

title: Bug: Arrow key navigation (up/down) not working
description: moveUp and moveDown only navigate to actionable INCOMPLETE items. Navigation should allow moving between actionable items regardless of completion status.

title: Tweak: Space and Down Arrow should skip to next available item
description: Modify navigation so that the Spacebar and Down Arrow keys jump to the next incomplete item, skipping over already completed ones.

title: Feature: Display keyboard shortcut hints on reload
description: Show subtle hints for keyboard shortcuts to help users. For example, remind them that 'Shift + X' resets the state when they reload the page.

title: Feature: Allow parent nodes to be interactable items
description: Enable the ability to mark parent nodes in the JSON as items that can be checked off, instead of just being containers.

title: Feature: Visual 'speed effect' for fast progress
description: Add a visual 'speed' effect (like motion trails or UI changes) that scales with how quickly the user completes items.

title: Design: Improved completion screen experience
description: Create a more satisfying and 'better' visual/interaction state for when the user finishes a checklist.

title: Feature: In-app checklist editing
description: Allow users to modify their checklist structure directly from the web interface without editing JSON files manually.

title: Refactor: Improved checklist JSON format (null/true support)
description: Move away from using pipes for non-items. Use ': null' for non-interactable items and ': true' or a value for interactable ones to give more control.

title: Feature: Save checklist state across reloads with 'Shift + X' reset
description: Implement state persistence so progress isn't lost on refresh. Add 'Shift + X' as a global shortcut to reset the current checklist state.
